text: Edward J. Trumbull (born as Edward J. Trembly) (November 3, 1860 – January 14, 1937) was a Major League Baseball outfielder and pitcher. He played for the 1884 Washington Nationals. ==Sources== Category:Major League Baseball outfielders Category:Major League Baseball pitchers Category:Washington Nationals (AA) players Category:Baseball players from Massachusetts Category:19th-century baseball players Category:1860 births Category:1937 deaths Category:People from Chicopee, Massachusetts Category:Holyoke (minor league baseball) players Category:Springfield (minor league baseball) players
title: Ed Trumbull
